title: Define Project Scope and Requirements: Asistente Neurofeedback (Revised)
description: Create a thorough document detailing the project requirements, user stories, desired features, and non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, security, scalability, maintainability) for the neurofeedback assistant. This includes identifying specific use cases, target audience, system architecture, and any additional technical details necessary to fully understand the project scope. To ensure clarity and comprehensiveness, consider breaking down the document into separate sections for functional requirements, non-functional requirements, user stories, and system architecture. Also, include potential edge cases and any known limitations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, and data flow.

title: Develop Hardware Components
description: Design and develop the hardware components required for neurofeedback data acquisition and processing.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Develop the software components for data processing, visualization, and user interface.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for neurofeedback data.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan for the neurofeedback assistant.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security and Privacy Measures for Data Protection and User Privacy
description: Implement robust security measures to ensure data protection, user privacy, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA). This includes encryption, secure communication protocols, access controls, data anonymization, regular vulnerability assessments, adherence to best practices for securing sensitive data, and opt-in user consent mechanisms. In addition, consider implementing multi-factor authentication, regular security audits, and incident response plans. The design of the system architecture should be reviewed and revised if necessary to accommodate these measures.

title: Develop Deployment and DevOps Strategy for Neurofeedback Assistant
description:
Create a comprehensive deployment and DevOps strategy for the neurofeedback assistant, encompassing continuous integration, continuous delivery/deployment (CI/CD), containerization, infrastructure provisioning, monitoring, and logging. Ensure adherence to scalability, reliability, and security best practices, focusing on flexibility to accommodate real-time neurofeedback requirements. The strategy should address the following key aspects: 
1. Version control for easy management of changes and updates.
2. Automated testing to ensure quality and stability.
3. Containerization using Docker or Kubernetes for portability and scalability.
4. Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using tools like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation for efficient and consistent infrastructure provisioning.
5. Monitoring and logging using tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK stack to monitor application performance and diagnose issues quickly.
6. Security measures including secure coding practices, encryption, and intrusion detection systems.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user documentation, training materials, and support resources for the neurofeedback assistant.
